name: Dinari SIVR
description: The Dinari SIVR dShares token (SIVR.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the abrdn Physical Silver Shares ETF (SIVR), an exchange-traded fund that tracks the performance of physical silver prices. Each SIVR.d token is fully backed by a corresponding SIVR ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, SIVR.d provides investors with efficient access to silver investments while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
